Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Sometimes the world feels, hmm, boring.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We've visited all the remote islands, conquered the Arctic, and penetrated the deepest jungles.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: But there is still one place to explore.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: It's a wet and deadly desert inhabited by mysterious creatures, living in total darkness.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The deep sea.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Let's dive down.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: When we look at the sheer scale of the Earth's oceans, it's hard to believe that less than 2% of all biomass on Earth lives here.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: And of that small percentage, around 90% is located close to the surface in the first 200 meters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: This is where we begin our journey.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Here light can still penetrate the water, which allows photosynthesis to occur.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Fyto-Pountain, trillions and trillions of single-celled algae in bacteria make up the foundation of the ocean's ecosystem, and they're consumed by bigger plankton, who are consumed by other species.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The sea floor at this depth is akin to the Amazon rainforest, and is often covered with coral reefs, algae, and other sea plants that are home to a plethora of sea animals.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: So far we've focused most of our attention on this comparatively pleasant environment, where we fish, swim, pollute and do science.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: So, let's dive deeper.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Moving from familiar coastal waters into deeper and more remote waters, we eventually reach the edge of the continental shelf, where we're confronted with the continental slope, the longer sent down to the deep sea.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: With every additional meter of water light fades drastically, which means there are basically no more plants, and the seemingly steep continental slope, begins to remind us of the surface of the moon.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Looking out where faced by what seems to be endless open water.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Let's leave the slope by-dust and enter what's known as the twilight zone, the portal to the deep sea.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: As we sink down further, the water pressure rises to deadly levels.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The deepest scuba dive ever came in at 332 meters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: At that depth, the pressure is like having 200 cars stacked on top of you.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Yet we've only completed 3% of our journey.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: While this region seems pretty grim, many fish and other animals actually spend at least half their lives down here.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: During the day, it's a good place to rest and recover, hidden from predators in the vast dark waters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: At night, they can travel more safely into shallow zones to feed in the food-rich surface waters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: In this transition zone between twilight and darkness, light becomes a powerful tool.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Over 90% of the species indigenous to this deep environment use bio-luminacense chemicals to create night.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: They do so as camouflage against the very faint sunlight to send signals to potential mates or to confuse and scare attackers.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Or they use light to hunt.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Another tool for survival in the dark is teamwork.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: At around 700 meters, we encounter a colony of ciphonophores.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: They can be up to 50 meters in length, but are only as wide as a broomstick.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: To attract prey, a colony creates a tragically beautiful bright blue or red light and applies a curtain of tentacles filled with toxic needles the kill anything that comes to close.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: But most species living down here have to rely on an unlikely resource, marines snow.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: White, flaky stuff that constantly sinks from the surface to the bottom of the ocean.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: It consists of dead plant or animal parts, fico matter, shells, sand or dust.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Even though this doesn't sound very tasty, without this crucial resource, life in the deep sea would starve.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: It's in this area that the most fascinating battles between two unlikely enemies could happen.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Spurm whales hunt and attack a giant squid the size of a house.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: While the squid fight back for roachously, they probably don't stand a chance, but they do leave permanent marks on their killer skin.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: As we reach 1000 meters, deeper than the tallest structure built by humans, we need to be careful.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: This is the midnight zone, a place of utter darkness.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: A barely explored wet wasteland consisting of nothing but endless black and open water.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: These depths is harder for a human to take a swim than to take a walk in space.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Finding food down here is really hard, so life had to adapt to and become extremely energy efficient.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Like the 30 centimeter long vampire squid that floats through the water without motion, with long and slender catching arms extended, they're covered in tiny stiff hairs which brush food from the water.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: This saves a lot of energy compared to actively catching food.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: For carnivorous fish, it's much harder to find food since living prey is quite rare down here.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: So the hunters have to get a perfect grip on their victim on first strike, otherwise it will escape into the dark.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Many deep sea predators have several sets of long and deadly teeth.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Like the Viperfish, which uses its long fangs to trap even large prey and swallow it whole.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: All the frill shark with its impressive set of 300 teeth which are curved backwards to hook their victims in their mouths.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We think further below the 3,800 mark as deep as the grave of the Titanic.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We are now at the Bissel Deds.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Here life happens in slow motion.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Preserving every last bit of energy is crucial for survival.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Everything down here, hovers motionless or swims in a slow, elegant fashion.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The only time the animals living in this zone move fast is when they have to escape danger.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Like the Dumbo Octopot paddling with its ear like fins or the Grenadiers fish with its slow, ear like tailbeats.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: At 4,000 meters we finally reach Grand Again, the Abyssal plane.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: It's covered in grey, modern rocks, dusted with the remains of the rain snow, which is consumed by animals like sea cucumbers, shrimp, sea urchins and sea worms.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: In some regions of the sea floor, small dark mineral deposits can be seen.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: These are Manganese nodules.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Deep sea corals and sponges use them to anchor themselves on the bottom of the sea.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Though life is sparse on the deep sea floor, even down here there are Oasis.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: In the Rift Valley's where tectonic plates are splitting apart, magma heats up sea water and creates dark jets of water and minerals as hot as 400 degrees Celsius that form elaborate chimneys and towers.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Extremophile bacteria use the minerals to create organic substances that are the basis for unique ecosystems.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: As we descend further, we reach the deepest point of the Abyssal plane at 6000 meters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: For most of the sea floor, this is as deep as it gets.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: But if we want to get to the deepest point of the oceans, we're actually only halfway there.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Let's enter the Hateful Zone, the Underworld of the Sea.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: It consists of long narrow trenches that only make up around 0.25% of the oceans and are among the most extreme environments on Earth.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Only extremophiles exist down here, like the ethereal snailfish that holds the record for the deepest living fish ever seen at around 8,000 meters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We see Spiky and sharp black rocks rush by as we sink down to more than 10,000.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Until we reach the final slope, a trench inside the larger Mariana trench with gently sloping sides that in frame of valley about 1.6 km wide.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: This is it, the deepest point, the Challenger Deep, 11,000 meters below the surface.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The water pressure here is 1,086 bar.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Taking a swim here is like having to balance 1,800 elephants on top of you.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: But even here, life has found a way to thrive.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Next to sea cucumbers, white and light pink amphibods wiggle their way through the water.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Their size is astounding.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: While their shallow water cousins and media few centimeters long, the deep sea version can reach up to 30 centimeters.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: And there are other things floating elegantly through the water.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Plastic bags that were found by scientists in 2018.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: Even the remotest place on Earth is not safe from human influence.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: There's nothing left to do now and our oxygen is running out, so we begin our set.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: After hours of traveling through dark nothingness, we finally see a glimpse of light.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We arrive back at a calm surface.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: The oceans are so deep, there is so much of them.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: We owe it to ourselves and to our descendants to preserve them as well as we can.

Title: What’s Hiding at the Most Solitary Place on Earth? The Deep Sea
Sentence: There are still so many wondrous things left to be discovered.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Some groups just don't get along.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Every day billions of soldiers fight a merciless war on thousands of fronts, and it's been going on for over 100 million years.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The World War of the Earth.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The World War of the Earth.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Answer our ancient beings.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The arose around 160 million years ago, and took over a wide variety of ecological niches so successfully that they became one of the dominant animals on planet Earth.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Today, they count more than 16,000 different species with over 10,000 trillion individuals.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Collectively, ants alone make up 20% of the entire animal biomass on land.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Similar to humans, their recipe for success is collaboration.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: While a single ant is pretty useless, together they are able to achieve stunning feats.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They construct complex colonies, careful livestock, pursue agriculture, or have complex symbiotic relationships.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: And of course, ants wage war.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Even among the same species, a constant state of conflict is pretty common.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: skirmishes, raids, and full on invasions are happening every day, causing millions of casualties.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Let's look at some of the most interesting ones in a series of videos.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: In this one, the army ant, a swarm, made for war.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The army ant group consists of about 200 different species.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Army ants do not build nests.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They live a sort of nomadic lifestyle with groups of millions of individuals.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: On a hunt, some species form large columns up to 100 meters long, killing and immediately dismembering every insect or small vertebrate they encounter.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The biggest hunting parties can kill up to 500,000 animals per day.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Some army ants specialize in hunting and consuming other social insects, like termites, wasps, and especially other ants.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Wasps are fierce, and may seem invulnerable, but if a swarm makes its way to their colonies, they don't even stand a chance.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The much bigger and stronger wasps might kill a few of them, but they are quickly overwhelmed.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Even if their queen survives to attack, the army ants steal the colony's larvae and quickly devour them.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: There is no recovery from that.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: When army ants discover another ant colony, they immediately attack.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Now you might think this would be a more even battle, but it's not.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Because army ants act as a social unit, they are especially dangerous and effective.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Most army ants are not particularly impressive individually, but they can overwhelm their victims with sheer numbers before the victim colony can mount an effective defense.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: And so invasions tend to be won by the attackers, and the prey colony is damaged significantly or is exterminated.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Interesting the army ants don't fight army ants.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: When two swarms encounter each other in the wild, they either pass through each other, ignoring the other swarm, or both colonies just move away, which makes sense from an evolutionary standpoint.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Army ants that fought other army ants probably eradicated themselves millions of years ago.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Indeed, they are so deadly that other ant species had to specialize to survive their presence.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Many species just panic and evacuate their nest when they notice army ants scouts, carrying as many larvae with them as they can, in order to return and rebuild after the attack.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Other species have invented living bunkers since fighting is so futile.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They have worker classes that have big square heads.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: When army ants show up, they use them to block the entrances to their nests, so the attackers have to give up after a while.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: But not everybody is afraid of army ants.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Leaf cutter ants form some of the largest and most complex societies of any animal other than humans.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They live in extensive nests, many meters deep and across, harboring millions of citizens with a highly sophisticated division of labour.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Like huge soldiers, 100 times more massive than a worker.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Their sole purpose might be to defend their colonies against army ants.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They still have a nemesis though.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The diet of the army ants species nomamonics as an Beckyi consists mostly of the larvae of other ants.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Compared to other army ants, they have a more robust soldier cast.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: So far, they are the only known species that can successfully attack a mature colony of leaf cutters.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: When they find a leaf cutter colony, hundreds of thousands attack in a long column.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The moment the leaf cutter ants notice the army ant attack, they go into crisis mode and immediately alert their soldiers who very quickly swarmed the side of attack.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: A front-mind develops that can be a few meters wide and up to a meter deep.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The leaf cutters soldiers go head to head with the army ants, lock in on them and try to cut through their heads.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Smaller leaf cutters work as help by grabbing the enemies.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Small teams carry out attacks behind the front-line where they dismember their enemies by ripping their legs from their bodies.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: The attackers meanwhile try to swarm their victim's soldiers and sting them to death in a mob.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Despite the powerful defense and the determined response, the army ants are still superior in numbers.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: So without knowing if the battle can be won, the leaf cutters prepare for the worst.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Workers rush to create barricades and seal off as many entrances to their nest as possible to secure their brood.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: If the leaf cutters are not able to repel the invaders or at least barricade enough of their entrances in time, the army ants swarm the nest overrunning all opposition.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They penetrate deep into the hidden chambers and steal tens of thousands of the leaf cutters brew to eat them.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Even if the leaf cutter colony survives, this is a heavy blow.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Regardless who's won the war, thousands lay slain on the battlefields.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: When the army ants attack, death follows them.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: But there are other species that form much more dangerous antarmids, species that form super colonies covering thousands of square kilometers over multiple continents, engaging in wars kilometers across.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: They deserve their own video though.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: No matter the scale, war is a part of ant existence, be it between huge colonies or small groups trying to fend up a raid.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: In tropical rainforests, but also in the cracks of the concrete we walk over every day.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: Humans have decided that war is not a thing that they want to do a lot anymore.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: For ants though, the other ant will always be the enemy.

Title: The World War of the Ants – The Army Ant
Sentence: No, some groups just don't get along.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Every living being needs to fight off for other living beings that want to feast on them.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: So as multi-cellular life evolved over billions of years, it came out with ways to defend itself.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Today, humans have a sophisticated defense network like physical barriers, defense cells and weapons factories.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But one of the most important defenses of our body is largely unknown.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The complement system.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: It evolved over 700 million years ago and is an army over 30 different proteins that work together in a complex and elegant dance to stop intruders.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: All in all, about 15 quintillion of them are saturating every fluid in your body right now.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Guided by nothing but chemistry, these proteins are one of the most effective weapons we have against invaders.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Many other parts of the immune system are just tools to activate the complement system.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But it's also really dangerous.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Imagine having trillions of little bombs inside your blood that could go off at any moment.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: So our cells use numerous mechanisms to prevent complement from accidentally attacking them.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Okay, what exactly does it do and what makes it so dangerous?

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: In a nutshell, the complement system does three things.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: It cripples enemies, it activates the immune system, and it rips holes and things until they die.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But how?

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: After all, these are mindless proteins randomly drifting around without will or direction.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Well, this is actually part of the strategy.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Component proteins float around in a sort of passive mode.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: They do nothing until they get activated and change their shape.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: In the world of proteins, your shape determines what you can and cannot do, because shape determines what you can interact with and in what way.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: For example, in your passive shape you might do nothing.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: In your active shape, however, you might for example change the shape of other proteins, activating them, so they can activate others.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Mechanisms like this one can start cascade that spread very quickly.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Imagine the complement proteins as being like millions of matches very close together.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Once one cat is fire, it ignites the ones around it.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: And then, more, and suddenly, you have a big fire.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: To show the actual mechanisms of the complement system is a tad complicated and overwhelming, so will simplify it.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Now, let's imagine you cut yourself and a bunch of bacteria enter the wound and make it into the surrounding tissue.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Now, complement attack begins with C3.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: C3 is the first match, the initial spark that will start our fire.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: To do that, C3 needs to switch from passive to active.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: How this happens is complex, but let's just say it can happen randomly through other complement proteins that bind to enemies or through antibodies.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: All you really need to know is that C3 breaks into two smaller proteins, C3A and C3B that are now activated.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: One of these parts, the C3B protein, is like a seacamousal specialized in bacteria, fungi and viruses.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: It has a fraction of a second to find a victim or it will be neutralized by water molecules.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: If C3B does find a target, it anchors itself very tightly to its surface and doesn't let go.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: By doing so, the protein changes its shape again.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: In its new shape, it's now able to grab other proteins and start a small cascade, changing its shape multiple times, adding other complement proteins to itself.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Finally, it transforms itself into a recruiting platform known as C3Convertis.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: This platform is an expert at activating more C3 proteins that start the whole cycle of new.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: An amplification loop begins.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Soon, thousands of proteins cover the bacteria.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: For the bacteria, this is very bad.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: It can cripple the bacteria and make them helpless or slow them down.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Imagine being covered by thousands of flies.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But there's more.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Do you remember the other part of C3?

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The C3A protein.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: C3A is like a distress beacon.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Thousands of them flood away from the site of battle, streaming for attention.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Pensive immune cells notice the C3A proteins and awaken from their slumber to follow the protein tracks to the site of infection.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The more alarm proteins, the more aggressive they get.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: This way, complement guides reinforcements exactly to the place where they're needed the most.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: So far, the complement has slowed down the invaders and called for help.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Now, it's beginning to actively help to kill the enemy.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The first immune cells to arrive at the battlefield are Fagassites, which means cells that swallow you whole, trap you in a tiny prison and then kill you with acid.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But to swallow an enemy, they need to grab it first, which is not easy because bacteria prefer not to be grabbed and a sort of slippery.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But now, the complement that has anchored self to the bacteria acts as a sort of glue that makes it easy for the immune cells to catch their victims.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But it gets even better.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Imagine being covered in flies again.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Now, imagine them turning into wasps.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Another cascade is about to begin.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: On the surface of the bacteria, the C3 recruitment platform changes its shape again and begins to recruit new proteins.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Together, they begin the construction of a bigger structure, a membrane attack complex.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Peace by peace, new proteins shaped like long spears anchor themselves deep into the bacteria's membranes.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Until they rip a hole into them, they can't be closed again.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Fluids rush into the bacteria and their insides spill out.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: They bleed to death.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The remaining bacteria are mailed and distracted by the complement and quickly taken care of by the arriving immune cells.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The invasion has been nipped in the bud before it had the opportunity to become dangerous.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: You probably didn't even notice it.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But while bacteria are not happy about complement, the enemies it might be the most useful against are actually viruses.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Viruses have one problem.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: They need to travel from cell to cell.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Outside of cells, they're basically hoping to randomly bump against a cell to infect by pure chance.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Here, they're completely defenseless.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: And here, complement is able to intercept and cripple them, so they become harmless and guide the immune system to devout them.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Without complement, virus infections would be a lot more deadly.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: But wait, if we have such an effective weapon, why do we ever get sick?

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The problem is that in a war, both sides are doubt.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: For example, when the vaccinate virus infects a cell, it forces it to produce a protein that shuts complement activation down.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: This way, the virus creates safe zones around the cells it infects.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: When it kills them and tries to infect more, it has a higher chance of being successful.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: For some bacteria, for example, can grab certain molecules from the blood that keep the complement system calm and make themselves invisible.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: So the complement system, while being extremely important, is only one player in the complex and beautiful organization that is our immune system.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: A beautiful example of how many mindless things can do smart things together.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: This video was sponsored by YOU.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Without your direct support, this channel would not exist, and it's hard to overstate how grateful we are for that.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: In 2019, an average Quad's Gazad video took at least 1,200 hours to produce.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: We need months to research and write our scripts, clear them with experts, illustrate and animate every scene from scratch and to compose original music.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: This is only possible through a combination of sponsorships, your support on Patreon and selling merch.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: Like this poster and postcards we made about the complement system.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: If you yourself want to support us, you can do so by watching, becoming a Patreon, and maybe getting a personal bird, or by getting one of our calendars or posters.

Title: Tiny Bombs in your Blood - The Complement System
Sentence: The purpose of Quad's Gazad is to make the best videos we can, and to make science more approachable.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Electricity is all around us all the time.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: It makes our lives easier, safer, more fun, and most of us never think about it.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But is there such a thing as too much electricity?

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Could the thing that is the foundation of the modern world slowly be killing us?

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Before we dive deeper, let's try to understand what electricity is, and how to fix us.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Electricity is the movement of an electric charge.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This movement generates electric and magnetic fields that spread out through space and carry energy.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: We call this phenomenon electromagnetic radiation.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Radiation is a word that makes people very nervous, but to radiate just means giving off.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Like when the radiator in your house gives off heat in the form of infrared radiation.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Different parts of the electromagnetic spectrum correspond to different types of radiation, and many of them are perfectly harmless.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Some of them can be dangerous though.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Radiation with very short wavelengths, like UV light, x-rays, and gamma rays are strong enough to rip electrons out of their atoms, which can cause burns and genetic damage.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This is what many people have in mind when they hear the term radiation.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The rest of the spectrum covers a large range of long waves from visible light, infrared, microwaves to radio waves.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This is the kind of radiation that's emitted by all sorts of human technology.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Mobile phones, WiFi roosters, electric power lines, and household appliances.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This radiation doesn't disrupt molecules in our body.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: However, some kinds of radiation can stimulate muscles and nerves, and can also make the hair on your body vibrate, which can sometimes cause a tinkly feeling above certain threshold values.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Other kinds are useful for making dinner.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Microwaves push the water molecules in your food around, which warms it up.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This happens to us all the time.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: For example, the pleasant warmth you feel at the beach is your skin heating up from exposure to electromagnetic infrared radiation from the sun.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: We are surrounded by natural and generally harmless sources of electromagnetic radiation all the time, and always have been.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But since the industrial revolution, we have added a lot of it to our immediate environment.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The question of whether this is actually dangerous first got public attention when a 1979 study linked leukemia to living near power lines.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: This particular study was quickly discredited though.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The connection could not be explained, and no direct causal link was confirmed.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But once this had been proposed, the idea persisted, and the thousands of studies about possible dangers illustrate that it's still seen as a very real threat.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: A lot of people came to be sensitive to the radiation coming from our appliances and cell phones.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: They report symptoms like headaches, nausea, skin reactions, burning eyes or exhaustion.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But those are just effects reported on a day-to-day basis.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: A few studies have found much more unsettling results.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Like possible connections between the side of the brain, which people use when they're on their phones, and the appearance of brain tumours.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The question that science is trying to answer is not so much about the acute effects of irradiation.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: We know, for example, that x-rays cause immediate damage to the DNA in your cells, but that the same doesn't happen with radio waves.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The question is rather, is the sort of weak electromagnetic radiation we are constantly surrounded by harmful in the long run, as a result of some as yet unknown mechanism.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Answering this question was much harder than we first thought.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: There are thousands of primary sources reports and statements by an onslaught of different organizations.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: So we read a lot for this video.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: You can take a look at our research in the video description.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: What we found is that this debate is a good example of how science should be communicated and how it shouldn't.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Many of the much-sighted studies that spread panic about electromagnetic radiation are highly controversial.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: For example, the series of population studies based on surveys and self-reporting.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: What this means is, for example, asking brain tumour patients how much they think they use their phone in the last few years.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The problem is that people are unreliable.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: We tend to misremember things or can be influenced easily.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: On top of this, studies or media reports may be cherry picking the findings that best suit their opinion or make for the most exciting headline.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: For example, a study looking for cancer in rats and mice from cell phone radiation.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The results seemed to show a connection, but for some reason only in male rats.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: And not at all in mice, but it was reported as if this study did prove that mobile phone radiation causes cancer.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Unfortunately, this is the case for studies with both positive and negative findings on the issue.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Another aspect is that the WHO did officially classify radio frequency fields as possibly a carcinogenic.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But what this actually means is that there are some hints that they might cause cancer, but we can't prove it, and that we will keep an eye out.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: So, if we zoom out a bit, what's the big picture?

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: On the whole, there was no consistent evidence in human studies that electromagnetic radiation below exposure value limits causes health problems.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: There are some statistical associations, but they're mostly weak and inconsistent.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: If there were any definite cause effect relations, we would know by now because of all the data we have.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: So, based on the current state of science, should you worry about the radiation from your laptop or cell phone or TV?

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: The answer is no, you shouldn't.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But what about the people that say is is harming them?

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Research showed they could be experiencing what's known as the Nassibua effect.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: If you have a headache and happen to start feeling better right when you switch off your laptop, you might see a connection between those two things.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Once you get this suspicion, the idea alone that weak radiation might harm you could be the very thing harming you.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: It's easy to belittle these people, most of them feel they're not being taken seriously, which makes the situation even worse for them.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: They should get support, but it's important to be aware that so far we have no robust evidence that electricity below safety limits has any negative effect on humans.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: In the attention economy we live in, talking about unproven dangers can make us neglect things that we know for sure about for us.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Just one example.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Outdoor air pollution is linked to 4.2 million premature death's seizure and is definitely something we could have a real impact on today.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: Still to make people feel safe and just to make sure there are several long-term studies ongoing already.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: For example, the Cosmos study that will look at the possible health impacts of cell phone use by exactly measuring frequency and duration of phone calls.

Title: Could Your Phone Hurt You? Electromagnetic Pollution
Sentence: But while we wait for the conclusion of these long-term studies, there are a lot more pressing problems to focus on.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: When our vegetarian ancestors started eating meat around 2 million years ago, it wasn't just because animals taste great, it was pure necessity.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Climate change made many of the plants our ancestors relied on less available and meat breached that gap.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: From the discovery of fire at the latest, meat became a staple of the human diet.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: But over the last few years, eating meat has increasingly been associated with health risks like heart disease certain cancers and an early death.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: So, how unhealthy is meat really?

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: In this video, we'll only talk about meat.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Dairy products deserve a video of their own.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Biologically, we need to eat for three reasons, for energy to acquire materials to fabricate ourselves and to get special molecules that our bodies can't make themselves.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The energy and most of the materials come from the three metro nutrients fats, carbohydrates and proteins.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Proteins are the most important resource for repairing and replenishing our cell structures.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The special molecules are a large variety of vitamins and minerals we need to drive metabolic processes.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Meat provides us with most of these things.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: It contains all essential amino acids our body needs and a lot of minerals like iron, zinc, and essential vitamins, some of which are barely found in plants like Vitamin B12.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Only one essential nutrient is missing in most of the meat we consume, Vitamin C. It appears in almost all plants and supports our immune system as well as the development of connective tissues.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: After a few months without it, you'd get scurvy.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: But meat has another big advantage, it's high bioofelibinacy.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Some of the nutrients in meat are broken down faster and available quicker than those from plants.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Spinach, for example, contains more iron than meat, but it's absorbed much slower, and the body needs more energy to digest it.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Several health benefits have also been observed in communities that rely solely on meat.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The Inuit, for example, are able to survive in extreme climate conditions on a purely meat-based diet if necessary.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Since they consume the whole animal, including the organs, they get every single nutrient they need, including Vitamin C. So meat itself is definitely not dangerous for us, but it's health effects vary, depending on how it's prepared, and what animal it comes from.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: When talking about meat in the Western world, we generally mean muscle tissues that have a high nutrient density, but also lack some of the vitamins that make it possible to survive on meat alone.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The most healthy animals to eat are probably fish.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Fish contains polyunsaturated fatty acids like Amiga 3, which may lower the risk of cardiovascular diseases and support anti-inflammatory immune functions.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: As part of a balanced diet, fish can be eaten regularly without worries.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Eating fish comes with its own bag of complications, though, like overfishing and the destruction of the oceans.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: We'll talk about that in another video.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: A close second is the most popular meat chicken.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: It's regarded as the meat with the fewest health risks.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The only negative health effect of poultry is a bit controversial.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Fat.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Its high content of saturated fats is associated with a higher cholesterol level and cardiovascular disease.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: But this idea has also been criticized by a large number of scientists, arguing high cholesterol levels might be inherited and not caused by nutrition.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: So, in general, if you want meat and are concerned about your health, go for chicken.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Things start to get problematic with high-intakes to red meat like beef, veal, pork, lamb, horse and goat.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: A recently published study recommends, for example, a maximum of 23 grams of red meat per day, which is a very small steak per week.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: However, large scale meta-analysis studies have shown that eating 100 grams of red meat every day increases the relative risk of diabetes by 19 percent of strokes by 11 percent of the weight.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: By 11 percent, and of colorectal cancer, by 17 percent.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: This sounds alarming, but before we panic, let's have a look at how these studies were conducted.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Because this brings us to the second big problem when trying to answer the question of whether meat is unhealthy or not.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Most studies that linked health risks to eating red meat were case-controlled studies, which means taking a group of people with a disease and classify them by their eating habits.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The more red meat they consume, the more likely they were to contract certain diseases.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The problem is that it's very hard to eliminate other factors.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: People who eat less meat tend to live a healthier lifestyle in general.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: They tend to eat more vegetables and fruit, and are less likely to smoke and drink alcohol.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Most studies try to eliminate these factors, but it's extremely hard to make definitive statements.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Things get worse when we look at processed meat, though.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Processing meat means adding certain chemicals by curing, smoking, sorting, or fermenting, or in other words, making it delicious.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Bacon, hands, salami, sausages, and hot dogs contain chemicals that are harmful for us.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Like nitrates and nitrites that can damage the DNA in our digestive system and lead to cancer.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The WHO reviewed 800 studies over 20 years and concluded that processed meat is strongly linked to an increased risk of colorectal cancer.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Each extra 50 grams of processed meat per day increases your relative risk of cancer by 18%.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: When it comes to cancer risk, processed meat is now in the same category as plutonium, asbestos, and smoking.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The WHO highlights that its research is only about the question of whether or not something causes cancer and not to what extent.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The processed meat may also significantly increase the chance of suffering from diabetes, strokes, and coronary heart diseases.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: It also makes a difference what sort of life out me lived when it was still part of a living being.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: It's common to feed large amounts of antibiotics to livestock in order to prevent diseases which can spread antibiotic resistance.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Combined, a high consumption of both red and processed meat could increase your chance of premature death by up to 29%.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: This means if your chance of dying is 3% this year, it's now 4%.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: This might not sound like a lot, but tiny percentages have a huge impact on societies of millions.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: They also seem harmless until they affect you.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: To blame me to loathe for bad health would be wrong though.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: There is no evidence that the very essence of meat has any negative effect beyond its high fat content, and even this point is highly contentious.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Just like with many other pleasures in life, sometimes too much of a good thing is harmful.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Most public health agencies suggest cutting meat consumption to 500 grams a week, while studies suggest cutting down processed meat as much as possible.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: So if you feast on meat no more than once or twice a week, you should be good.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: For most people this already means a drastic change in their diets though.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The average American consumes around almost 1,600 grams of meat a week.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The average German 1,100 grams a week.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: But many of us eat much much more.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: If you're not really sure, make a small note whenever you eat meat for a week or two.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: You'll be surprised how much it really is.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: So most people watching this video would benefit from cutting down on meat.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Aside from health concerns, there's still the fact that the meat industry is one of the largest contributors to climate change, and has reached a scale where it's impossible to deliver millions of tons of meat and still treat animals with dignity.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: We've already discussed that in detail in another video.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: All in all, in moderation, meat is not unhealthy, and you don't need to become vegetarian overnight to have a real impact on your health and the planet.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: But your lifestyle choices do matter for yourself and for others.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: The key is being open to trying something new once in a while.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Maybe you'll discover your new favorite dish.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Until you try, you'll never know what you'll enjoy or what you're capable of.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Maybe after watching hours of Cod's Gazard videos, you've decided you'd like to learn how to animate.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Now you might not know this, but most of our team actually has a graphic design background.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: Learning about design principles first before we got into animation was really key to where we are today.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: There's a really great new Skillshare class on using Adobe Illustrator, the software we used to create artwork, bike graphic designer, Aaron Draplin, and we can personally recommend it.

Title: Is Meat Bad for You? Is Meat Unhealthy?
Sentence: It's full of great tips to help understand and simplify a very complicated program.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Being a citizen of the European Union means that many aspects of our lives are regulated by a weird entity.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: It feels like a huge bureaucracy is making decisions over our heads.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Many Europeans think that their vote in the EU elections doesn't count and that the EU is not democratic.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: How democratic is the EU really?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: And does your vote actually achieve anything?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: In democratic states, public policies are based on the will of the people.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: But the people are not a coherent thing.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Countless different groups are battling for influence and power to establish laws and rules that benefit them.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: In a working democracy, there are checks and balances that are supposed to create a fair environment where these battles can be fought.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Turn if it's stop-factions from dominating too much.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: But all of this ends at our borders.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: International politics are not democratic, but a narquic.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: No central authority is powerful enough to ensure fairness or enforce laws, so the only law is the tyranny of the strongest and anarchy.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: So for most of human history, powerful countries took what they wanted from others, either by extortion or by violence.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: After World War II, the United Nations were founded to overcome this anarchy by establishing rules on how countries should behave.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: But since the UN has virtually no power, and its members often have opposing interests, it's usually politely ignored.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The EU is a construct that tries to have rules and laws for its member nations that are actually enforceable, as the European Court of Justice is able to make binding decisions.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Originally, the EU was founded to ensure peace between European nations and prosperity for the continent, but it's also an attempt to gain international power for its members.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: It's like a super state, and it's striving to be democratic and legitimized by all of its citizens.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: To do that, it has to solve the problem of different actors wanting different things.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Only that its members are countries with very different priorities.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: So, how does this work?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Since the EU is ridiculously complex, and politicians are even worse than scientists at naming things, we'll simplify massively and omit a lot of details.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: You can find further reading and explanations in our sources document.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Okay, if you want to create a democratic union of independent nations, you have two options.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: One, let everybody vote for national politicians who then make decisions for the Union together, or two, let every citizen vote directly for an independent institution that's able to make binding decisions.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Both approaches have their upsides and downsides, and the EU ended up with a mix of both of them.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Next to the European Court of Justice, there are four main institutions that we'll talk about today.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The European Council, which is made up of the heads of government or states of the member countries, the Council of the EU with ministers from the member countries.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The third one is the European Commission, which is the de facto government of the EU, having one commissioner for each member state, and lastly, the European Parliament.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The Parliament is the only part of the EU that is directly elected by you, dear citizen, in the European elections.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: In principle, all of these institutions of the EU originate from your direct or indirect vote, be it at the national or EU level.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: But some do more than others.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: For example, you vote for your national representative, and therefore contribute to form a national government, whose head of state has a seat in the European Council.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: These leaders choose the president of the EU Commission and its fellow commissioners, who eventually are confirmed by the EU Parliament.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: So this is a sort of indirect democracy.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: You didn't vote for the commission, but you voted for the people who appointed them, and for those who confirmed and police them.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: So, in effect, 2.5 of the four main European Union institutions depend on the member state governments.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: But since you, as a citizen, can only directly vote for the European Parliament, the question is, how powerful is it?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: How much influence does your vote have?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The European Parliament started out with very little influence, but has become more and more powerful over the past two decades.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Today, it has to approve new laws, which can be binding for the member countries.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: It also votes on how the EU budgets its spent and on international treaties.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: All of this makes the Parliament very powerful and thus your vote very influential, even on an international level.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Compare to national parliament, one major power is still missing, though.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The EU Parliament officially can't propose new laws on its own, which is often the core of the argument the EU is not democratic enough, and that the European Parliament should be given more influence.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Right now, the member states' governments pretty much control the European Union.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Giving the Parliament more power would make the EU as a whole more democratic, but it would also take power from member states.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: It's not clear which approach is better.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Ultimately, it's for the member states and us as citizens to decide how the Union should develop.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: Okay, so can we draw a conclusion here?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: As a whole, the EU is not as democratic as most of its member states, but it is democratic.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: If you don't like decisions they make, regarding copyright, for example, you can look up what your representatives voted for and vote them out.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The struggle to make it more democratic is closely tied to who holds power over what?

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: The EU keeps changing.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: You, dear citizen, are not only voting on the current politics, but also on what the system will look like in the future.

Title: Is the EU Democratic? Does Your Vote Matter?
Sentence: There are many parties and politicians that vow to make the EU Parliament and therefore your vote stronger.
