Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: What is the true nature of the universe?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: To answer this question, humans come up with stories to describe the world.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We test out stories and learn what to keep and what to throw away.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But the more we learn, the more complicated and weird our stories become.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Some of them so much so that it's really hard to know what they're actually about.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Like String Theory.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Many famous, controversial and often misunderstood story about the nature of everything.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Why do we come up with it?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: And is it correct or just an idea we should chuck out?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: To understand the true nature of reality we looked at things up close and were amazed.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: And there were hundreds of landscapes in the dust, zoos of bizarre creatures, complex protein robots.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: All of them made from structures of molecules made up of countless even smaller things, atoms.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We thought they were the final layer of reality until we smashed them together really hard and discovered things that can't be divided anymore, elementary particles.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But now we had a problem.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: They're so small that we could no longer look at them.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Think about it.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: What is his seeing?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: To see something we need light and electromagnetic wave.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This wave hits the surface of the thing and gets reflected back from it into your eye.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: The wave carries information from the object that your brain uses to create an image.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So you can't see something without somehow interacting with it.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Seeing is touching an active process not a passive one.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This is not a problem with most things.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Particles are very, very, very small.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So small that the electromagnetic waves we use to see are too big to touch them.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Visible light just passes over them.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We can try to solve this by creating electromagnetic waves with more and much smaller wavelengths.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But in quantum physics, shorter wavelengths means more energy.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So when we touch a particle with a wave that has a lot of energy, it gets a kick.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: By looking at a particle, we change it.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: In quantum physics, we cannot know where a particle is and where it's going with absolute precision.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This fact is so important that it has a name.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: The Heisenberg uncertainty principle, the basis of all quantum physics.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So what does a particle look like then?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: What is its nature?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We don't know.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: If we look really hard, we can see a blurry sphere of influence but not the particles themselves.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We just know they exist.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But if that's the case, how can we do any science with them?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We did what humans do and invented a new story, a mathematical fiction.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: The story of the point particle.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We decided that we would pretend that a particle is a point in space.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Any electron is a point with a certain electric charge and a certain mass.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: All indistinguishable from each other.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This way physicists could define them and calculate all of their interactions.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This can be made precise in quantum field theory and this solved a lot of problems.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: All of the standard model of particle physics is built on it and it predicts lots of things very well.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Some quantum properties of the electron, for example, have been tested and are accurate up to 0.0000000000002%.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So while particles are not really a point, by treating them as if they were, we get a pretty good picture of the universe.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Also needed this idea of advanced science, it also led to a lot of real-world technology we use every day.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But there's a huge problem, gravity.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: In quantum mechanics, all physical forces are carried by certain particles.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But according to Einstein's general relativity, gravity is not a force like the others in the universe.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: If the universe is a play, particles are the actors, but gravity is the stage.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: To put it simply, gravity is a theory of geometry, the geometry of space time itself, of distances which we need to describe with absolute precision.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But since there is no way to precisely measure things in the quantum world, our story of gravity doesn't work with our story of quantum physics.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: When physicists try to add gravity to the story by inventing a new particle, their mathematics broke down.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: And this is a big problem.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: As we could marry gravity to quantum physics and the standard model, we would have the theory of everything.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So very smart people came up with a new story.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: They asked, what is more complex than a point?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: A line, or a string.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: String theory was born.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: What makes string theory so elegant is that it describes many different elementary particles as different modes of vibration of the string.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Just like a violin string vibrating differently can give you a lot of different notes, a string can give you different particles.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Most importantly, this includes gravity.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: String theory promised to unify all fundamental forces of the universe.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This caused enormous excitement and hype.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: String theory quickly graduated to a possible theory of everything.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Unfortunately, string theory comes with a lot of strings attached.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Much of the maths involving a consistent string theory does not work in our universe with its three spatial and one temporal dimensions.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: String theory requires 10 dimensions to work out.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So string theorists dip calculations in model universes.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: And then try to get rid of the six additional dimensions and describe our own universe.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But so far, nobody has succeeded and no prediction of string theory has been proven in an experiment.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So string theory did not reveal the nature of our universe.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: One could argue that in this case string theory really isn't useful at all.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Science is all about experiments and predictions.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: If we can't do those, why should we bother with strings?

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: It really is all about how we use it.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Physics is based on maths, 2 plus 2 makes 4.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This is true no matter how you feel about it.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: And the maths in string theory does work out.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: That's why string theory is still useful.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: Imagine that you want to build a cruise ship, but you only have blueprints for a small rowing boat.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: There are plenty of differences.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: The engine, the materials, the scale.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But both things are fundamentally the same things that float.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So by studying the rowing boat blueprints, you might still learn something about how to build a cruise ship eventually.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: With string theory, we can try to answer some questions about quantum gravity that have been puzzling physicists for decades, such as how black holes work or the information paradox.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: String theory may point us in the right direction.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: When used in this spirit, string theory becomes a precious tool for theoretical physicists and help them discover new aspects of the quantum world and some beautiful mathematics.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: So maybe the story of string theory is not the theory of everything.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: But just like the story of the point particle, it may be an extremely useful story.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: We don't yet know what the true nature of reality is, but we'll keep coming up with stories to try and find out until one day, hopefully we do know.

Title: String Theory Explained – What is The True Nature of Reality?
Sentence: This video was supported by the Swiss National Science Foundation and realised with the scientific advice of Anne Somdres Fund journey.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: While some argue against it, others swear by its great power and effectiveness.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: How does Hermiumphithease work?

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: How did it become what it is today and what can modern medicine learn from it?

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The first principle of Hermiumphithease is, like, pure as like.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Remed is using ingredients that cause the symptoms you want to cure.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: In practice, that means that remedies against fever could, for example, be made from Belladona, which also causes fever.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: A mixture based from B venom is used to treat itchiswellings and so on.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The second principle is the special method of preparation called potentization.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The idea is that diluting and agitating the ingredients activates their curative powers and enhances their effect.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: To do this, the ingredient is dissolved in alcohol or distilled water.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Homeopaths take one part of the solution and mix it with nine parts of water diluting it down to one tenth of its original concentration and shaking it.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: What you have now is a 1x potency, one part ingredient and mine parts solvent named after the Roman Ural X for 10.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Now this process is repeated.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Take one part, mix it with nine parts of pure water and shake it vigorously.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Now you have two X.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: You do this again and again until you reach the desired grade of potency.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The finished remedy is then taken already or sometimes it's applied as little sugar padded that are sold as globy-d. A 20x potency for example is like dissolving one aspirin pill in the water volume of the whole Atlantic.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: But many are much more extreme like 30 C for example.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: C means that the mixture has one part ingredient and 99 parts water.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: So the commonly sold 30 C mixture means one part ingredient and one million billion billion billion billion billion parts of water.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: If we want to date globally per with a single atom of the original ingredient, then our pill will be the diameter of the distance between the earth and the sun.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: 150 million cloutes, a pill so massive that it would collapse into a back hole under its own mass.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Because of this, potentialization is one of the biggest criticisms of homeopathy.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The extreme dilution is supposed to make the ingredients more potent, but on a physical level this doesn't really make sense.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Most homeopathic remedies aren't diluted so much that not a single atom of the active ingredient is left in them.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: The explanation of why the mixture still work is that shaking the mixture after every dilution leaves behind a spirit like essence of the ingredient.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Basically the idea is that water remembers what was put into it.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: But if this were true, then every substance that ever met a drop of water would leave an essence behind and lead to unpredictable effects when it was accidentally ingested.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Think of all the stuff that lives and floats in the oceans every sip of water would be a supercharged homeopathic cocktail.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: So how did homeopathy become the most successful alternative medicine?

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: In the 18th century medicine was very different from today, treatments like bloodletting left the patient worse off than before.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: So Gemma physicians are more Alhanuman wanted a non-invasive natural way of healing and developed homeopathy.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: And in fact, homeopathic hospitals were soon successful because doing no harm beats doing harm.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: Hanuman imposed very strict rules on his patients.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: First you had to avoid coffee, tea, alcohol, spicy food, sweet food.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?
Sentence: No old cheese, no onions, no meat.

Title: Homeopathy Explained – Gentle Healing or Reckless Fraud?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Let's shrink an elephant to the size of a mouse and in large amounts and make it the size of an elephant because this is our video and we want to see what happens.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: First, our now tiny elephant stumbles around and then drops dead.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Tiny elephant buddy is very cold frozen to death in minutes.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Our giant mouse looks very uncomfortable for a moment and then it explodes, leaving hot mouse in size everywhere.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Why?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Because of size.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: We are optimized to function precisely for the size we are and would die horribly in any other environment.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But why exactly?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Why does our mouse explode and can we do this to our elephant too if we try hard?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Life on this planet is based on cells.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Cells do vary in size but they are pretty similar in their dimensions across all species.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: A blue whale doesn't have bigger cells than a hummingbird just a lot more of them.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Cells have to do a lot of stuff to stay alive and they need energy to be able to do so.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: To get this energy, animal cells convert food and oxygen into usable chemical energy.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: This happens in our mitochondria, the powerhouse of the cell.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: They are like little coal engines that spit out tiny ATP batteries which the cell can use for almost everything it needs to do.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Just like an engine, mitochondria get really hot while working.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: In human skin cells, they reach a scorching 50°C and some of our cells have up to 2000 to mitochondria which are radiating their heat into the cell.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So being alive generates a lot of heat.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The more cells you have, the more heat your body generates in total.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: If our bodies didn't find ways of losing this heat, we would be cooked from the inside and die.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But this is a problem for bigger animals because of the way bodies change as living being scaled up.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Animals have three properties here that are important.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: They're length, they're outside or skin and they're inside like organs, bones and hopes and dreams.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The thing that's hard to wrap your head around is that when things grow, they're inside grow faster than they're outside.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Imagine a fleshy cube.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: If you double the length of its sides, its surface and volume do not double.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: In fact, the surface is now four times the original size and the volume of the cube eight times the original size, which is called the square cube law and has been a nine major for billions of years.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So why is this a problem for big animals?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Because heat can only leave an object via its surface.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So if we make our mouse the size of an elephant or 60 times longer, it has 3,600 times more surface from which to lose heat.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But it has 216,000 times more volume filled with trillions and trillions of new hot mitochondria that produce more heat.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: A lot more insights not that much more skin.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Our mouse is very dead very fast.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But big things like elephants exist so how do they deal with the heat?

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The one they have evolved ways to get rid of energy more easily, like huge flat ears that have a lot of surface where heat can escape.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But that's not enough, nature's solution is actually very elegant.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Elephant cells are much much slower than my cells.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The bigger an animal is, the less active it cells are.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: If we classify animals by their metabolic rates and compare that to their overall mass, it's clearly visible.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: It's not 100% accurate, but it is a good rule of thumb.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Elephants are huge meat sacks filled with trillions and trillions of little coal ovens.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So they keep the ovens just active enough to keep the running and never it full power.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Their home metabolism is slow.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Things move at a nice chill pace.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Small animals need to go the exact opposite way.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: If you're small you have a lot of surface area compared to not a lot of volume.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: You don't have a lot of cell ovens and lose the heat they produce very fast.

Sentence: So very tiny mammals came up with a very extreme solution.

Sentence: With the body length of 4 cm, it only weighs about 1.8 grams, as much as a paperclip.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: It's a tiny ridiculous being.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: It would basically cool off immediately so it sells run on overdrive to stay warm.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Its tiny ovens are filled at maximum capacity.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: It's hard to beat up to 1200 times a minute and it brings up to 800 times a minute.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: This creates an extreme need for energy so the shrew has to eat constantly.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: After only 4 hours without food it starts to death.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: And while an African elephant consumes around 4% of its body weight in food each day, our shrew needs 200% of its body weight in food a day just to survive.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Imagine having to eat 2000 big max a day, more than one a minute, fun for a while, but they're not so much.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So a cubic centimeter of shrew needs 40 times more food than a cubic centimeter of elephant.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: If an elephant sells, suddenly become as active as the cells of a shrew, a crazy amount of heat would be generated.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: All the liquids in the elephant would suddenly start boiling and then it would explode in an impressive explosion of steaming hot burning elephant parts.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: In reality before an explosion occurred, the proteins making up our cells would probably be detonated and stop producing heat.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But a meat explosion is much more fun than melting an elephant into a massive hot goo.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Regardless, the scaling of the speed of metabolism happens everywhere, even in places we don't expect, like pregnant women.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: A baby in the womb of its mother behaves as if it were a part of her.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But cells have about the same metabolic rate, the same speed of life as its mother's organs.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: It is truly a part of a bigger whole rather than an individual.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Until it's not anymore.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The very moment a baby is born, a switch is flipped and all its internal processes speed are rapidly.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: 36 hours after birth, the baby's cells have the same activity rate as a mamnid size.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: The baby's literally transition from being an organ to being an individual in mere hours.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: But there's one thing where big and small things are very similar, heartbeat.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Mamnils tend to have a similar amount of heartbeat over their lifetime, typically around one billion.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: So while the true and elephant are very different, they share a similar number of heart beats over the course of their lives.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: Their speed of life is the opposite and somehow still the same.

Title: How to Make an Elephant Explode – The Size of Life 2
Sentence: And for a video in which we made elephants explode for no good reason, this is the most romantic ending we could come up with.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What if the state covered your cost of living?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Would you still go to work?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Go back to school.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Not work at all.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What would you do?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: This concept is called a universal basic income, or UBI, and it's nothing less than the most ambitious social policy of our times.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In 2017, basic income is gaining momentum around the world.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: First trials are ongoing or on their way, and the growing number of countries are considering UBI as an alternative to welfare.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: How would it work and what are the key arguments for and against?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Right now, people can't really agree what universal basic income is or should be.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Someone to use it to eliminate welfare and come bureaucracy.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Others wanted as a free extra for existing programs, or even wanted to be so high that work itself becomes optional.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: For this video, we'll talk mostly about the minimum basic income, enough money to be above the poverty line.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In the US, this means about $1,000 a month or $12,000 a year.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The money would not be taxed, and you could do whatever you wanted with it.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In this scenario, UBI is a way of transferring the wealth of a society, while still keeping the free market intact.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: But, if we hand out free money, will people just spend it on booze and stop working?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: A 2013 study by the World Bank specifically examined if poor people waste their handouts onto back-o and alcohol if they receive it in the form of cash?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The clear answer?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: No, they don't.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The opposite is true.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Other studies have shown that the rich U are no more drugs and alcohol you consume.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The lazy and drunk poor person is a stereotype rather than reality.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What about laziness?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Universal Basic Income Test Runs, done in Canada in the 1970s, showed that around 1% of the recipients stopped working, mostly to take care of their kids.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: On average, people reduce their working hours by less than 10%.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The extra time was used to achieve goals like going back to school, or looking for better jobs.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: But if laziness and drugs are not a huge deal, why doesn't our current welfare state solve poverty?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Well fair or unemployment programs often come with a lot of strings attached.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Like taking part in courses, applying to a certain number of jobs a month, or accepting any kind of job offer, no matter if it's a good fit or what it pays.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Besides the loss of personal freedom, these conditions are awfully huge waste of time and only serve to make the unemployment statistics seamless back.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Often your time would be much better spent looking for the right job, continuing education, or starting a business.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Another unwanted side-of-fact of many welfare programs is that they trap people in poverty and promote passive behaviour.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Imagine a benefit of $1,000 each month.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In a lot of programs, if you earn a single dollar extra, the whole thing is taken away.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: If you take a job that's paying $1,200, you might not only lose your benefits, but because of your taxes and other costs, like transportation, you might end up having less money than before.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: So if you actively try to better your situation, and your total income is not improving or even a shrinking, welfare can create a ceiling that traps people in poverty and rewards passive behaviour.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: A basic income can never be cut, and therefore getting a job and additional income will always make your financial situation better.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Work is always rewarded.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Instead of a ceiling, it creates a floor from which people can lift themselves up.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: But even if you be I is the better model, is it economically feasible?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What about inflation?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Won't prices just rise, making everything just like it was before?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Since the money is not being created by magic or printers, it needs to be transferred from somewhere.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It's more of a shift of funds than the creation of new ones.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Hence, no inflation.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Okay, but how do we pay for it?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: There's no right answer here because the world is too diverse.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: How well-offer countries, what the local values are.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Our things like high taxes or cutting the defence budget politically acceptable or not.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: How much welfare state is already in place and is it effective?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Each country has its own individual path to a UBI.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The easiest way to pay for a UBI is to end all welfare and use the free funds to finance it.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Not only would this make a number of government agencies disappear, which in itself saves money, it would also eliminate a lot of bureaucracy.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: On the other hand, cutting them could leave many people worse off than before.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: If the goal is to have a foundation for everybody, there still need to be programs of some sort because just like countries, people are not the same.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The second way, higher taxes, especially for the very wealthy.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In the US, for example, there's going to be a lot of economic growth but most of the benefits from it have gone to the richest few percent.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The wealth gap is rapidly widening and many argue that it might be time to distribute the spoils more evenly to preserve the social peace.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: There could be taxes on financial transactions, capital, land value, carbon, or even robots.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: But UBI is not necessarily expensive.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: According to a recent study, a UBI of $1,000 per month in the US could actually grow the GDP by 12% over eight years because it would enable poor people to spend more and increase overall demand.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What about the people who do the dirty work?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Who will work in the fields?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Crawl through sewers?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Or lift canos?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: If you don't need to force a rival, will people still do hard, boring and unfulfilling labour?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: UBI might give the enough leverage to demand better pay and working conditions.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: A study calculated that every extra dollar going to wage earners would add about $1,21 to the national economy while every extra dollar going to high income Americans would add only 39 cents.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: There would still be very rich and poor people, but we could eliminate fear, suffering and existential panic for a significant part of the population.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Making poor citizens better off could be a smart economic tactic.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: For some, this isn't enough.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: They want a UBI large enough to live a middle-class existence.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: If we set the financial obstacle aside, this idea fundamentally challenges how our society is constructed.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: By earning money, you earn the possibility to take part in society.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: This determines your status and options, but it also forces many people into spending huge chunks of their time on things they don't care about.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: In 2016, only 33% of US employees were engaged at work, 16% were actively miserable, and the remaining 51% were only physically present.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: What's 67% of people stop working if they could?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It would be unfair to portray workers just a chore.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Work gives us something to do.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It challenges us.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It motivates us to improve.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It forces us to engage.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Many find friends or partners at work.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: We work for social status, wealth and our place in the world.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: We're looking for something to do with our lives.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: And for many people, work gives them meaning.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: There are other concerns with UBI.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: If all welfare programs were exchanged for one single payment, this gives the government a lot of leverage.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Individual programs are easier to attack or cut than a multitude.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Or populists might promise drastic changes to the UBI to get into power.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: And a universal basic income doesn't tackle all problems when it comes to equality.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Rents, for example.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: While $1,000 might be great in the countryside, it's not a lot for expensive metropolitan areas, which could lead to poor people moving outwards and the difference between rich and poor becoming even more extreme.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: And of course, for some people, the concept of work itself, not being essential for survival is appalling.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: So is the universal basic income a good idea?

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The honest answer is that we don't know yet.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: There needs to be a lot more research, more and bigger test runs.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: We need to think about what kind of UBI we want, and what we're prepared to give up to pay phrase.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: The potential is huge.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It might be the most promising model to sustainably eliminate poverty.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: It might seriously reduce the amount of desperation in the world and make us all much less stressed out.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: This video was made possible by a universal basic income provided by you, our viewers.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: 10,000 people around the world give us a monthly income on patreon.com slash courtscazard.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: You enable us to pay salaries and buy you hardware.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: You enable us to make more videos and you enable us to spend more time on them.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Courtcazard would truly not be what it is today without your help.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: You help us stay independent, and you give us the freedom to put quality before quantity.

Title: Universal Basic Income Explained – Free Money for Everybody? UBI
Sentence: Thank you so much.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: An ant is pretty stupid.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: It doesn't have much of a brain, no will, no plan.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: And yet, many ants together are smart.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: An ant colony can construct complex structures.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Some colonies keep farms of fungi, others take care of cattle.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: They can wage war or defend themselves.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: How is this possible?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: How can a bunch of stupid things do smart things together?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: This phenomenon is called emergence, and it's one of the most fascinating and mysterious features of our universe.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: In a nutshell, it describes small things forming bigger things that have different properties than the sum of their parts.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Emergence is complexity arising from simplicity, and emergence is everywhere.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Water has vastly different properties to the molecules that make it up.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Like the concept of wetness.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Take wet fabric.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: If you zoom in far enough, there is no wetness.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: There are just molecules sitting in the spaces between the atoms of the cloth.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Wetness is an emerging property of water.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Something new only created by a lot of individual interactions between water molecules.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: And this is sort of it.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Many things interact under a certain set of rules creating something above and beyond themselves.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: It turns out that more is different.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: This different property is itself a new thing, and that new thing can cover with other new things to repeat the process.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: You can imagine this as layers stacked upon each other every layer made from more complex parts.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Asms form molecules form proteins, proteins make up cells, cells make up organs, organs form individuals, individuals form societies.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: But how can something be more than the sum it's part?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: How do ants form the sort of cloudy entity that is a colony?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: By following a rule set that produces order through chaos.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: For example, let's look at how an ant colony distributes jobs.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Let's assume that a colony should have 25% workers, 25% caretakers, 25% soldiers, and 25% gatherers.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Hence, communicate their current job via chemicals.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: For example, a worker and constantly secret chemicals that say, I'm a worker.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: When ants meet other ants, they sme each other together information telling each other their job and what they're doing.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Both keep track of who they met in the past.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Now, imagine an antita kills most of the gatherers.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: If this isn't fixed quickly, the colony will starve.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Many work ants need to switch jobs, but how do you tell this to thousands of them?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Simple.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: You don't.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Our worker ant will still meet and smell other ants, but it will encounter almost no gatherers at all.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: It counts two few gatherers until it reaches a critical point and then it changes its job.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: The worker becomes a gatherer.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Other ants will do the same until after a while there are enough gatherers again.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: The balance is restored all by itself.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: The actions and interactions of an individual are random.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: You can't plan which ant will encounter which other ant.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: But the simple set of rules is so elegant that a colony's many operations emerge as a consequence.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: On an even more fundamental level, hundreds of millions of complicated molecules interact to maintain a robust and amazing structure, a being with vastly different properties than the sum of its dead parts emerges.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: The smallest unit of life, a cell.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: We still don't have a clear definition of what living things are, we just know they emerge from things that are not alive.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Sells combine and cooperate, they specialize and respond to one another, and over time, we develop into complex organisms with remarkable capacities.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Your arms and legs and heart are an incredibly complex and complicated system made of trillions of individual stupid things, and yet we breathe, digest and watch YouTube videos.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: How do yourselves know what to do?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Think of the pace maker cells in your heart.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Billions of them need to send out an impulse just at the right moment to collectively create a heartbeat.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Our cells exchange chemical information with their neighbor cells to see what they're up to, and then decide what to do.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: If it's among a lot of cells that are working on the same task, it will start working on that task as well, and sync up with them.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: There is no mastermind giving commands, just single units communicating with their neighbors and acting according to the feedback they get.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: What about our most important part?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: What is the thing that asks these kinds of questions?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Is our consciousness then an emotion property of the cells in our brain?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: This question is too big and important, it deserves a video of its own.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Some things that emerge are hard to define.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: You can't touch an ant colony only its parts.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: It has neither brain nor face nor body, and yet the colony interacts with the world.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Just like a colony's emerge from ants, things emerge from humans like nations.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: What actually is the nation?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Is it its population?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Is it its institutions?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: It's symbols like its flag, colors or anthems.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: The physical things it makes like cities, the territory of occupies.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: All of these things are fluid.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Populations change and are replaced.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Institution's come and go, cities can be constructed and abandoned.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Borders have changed all the time for most of history, and symbols get replaced by new symbols.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: A nation has no face, no brain, no body.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Our nation's not real then?

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Of course they are.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Just like ant colonies, nations interact with the world.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: They can change landscapes, wage wars, grow or decline, and they can stop existing.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: But they only exist because of a lot of humans interacting with each other.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: But not just nations, all the complex structures that surround us emerge from us.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
Sentence: Even if we don't intend to, we are constantly creating, communities, companies, cities, societies.

Title: Emergence – How Stupid Things Become Smart Together
