Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: In the year 1014, by Zantine Emperor Basil II defeated the Bulgarian army and captured 15,000 prisoners.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: He could have killed them, but he had a different idea.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: He wanted to weaken his opponents for decades to come, so he ordered that 99 out of every 100 prisoners be blinded.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: The 100th to be spared one eye to guide the rest back home, forcing their communities to care for them for the rest of their lives.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Today, humans are subject to an attack just as cynical as this, by a league of supervillains called NTDs.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: One in seven humans on the planet suffers from one or more NTDs more than the entire population of Europe.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: They do unimaginable damage.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: By crippling countless people, they destroy billions of dollars in income each year, he can communes in slow progress.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: What are these monsters straight out of a horror movie seeking to wreak havoc on our species?

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: NTDs are caused by a vast range of different parasites such as worms, amoeba, bacteria, or viruses.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: The symptoms they cause are just as diverse and truly the stuff of nightmares.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Some like hookworms compete with children's brains and bodies for nutrition, stunting growth and impairing intelligence.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Some NTDs cause blindness as a result of awful eye infections.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Other parasites can find patients to bed for months and damage internal organs, often shortening lifespans drastically.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: At others cause horrible disfigurments that lead to social stigma, a life lived in shame and unemployment.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: There are also a few that are incredibly agonizing, they cause continuous itching or horrible pain.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: In fact, let's introduce you to one of them, Dracounculices.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: If you accidentally drink water infected by it, you won't notice anything for a year.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Until one day, you suddenly see a blister on your leg.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: The world breaks out of the skin to release new larvae.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: The only way to remove it is to slowly put it out of your leg.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Centre by centre meter over the course of several weeks, because Dracounculices is now up to a meter long.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: We can all agree that we should kill such parasites with fire.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: That's why we declared war on them, pleading to eradicate most of them by 2020 and we tried doing that very hard.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: In 1985, there were 3.5 million cases of Dracounculices all over the world.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: In 2015, there were 22.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: We killed 99.99% of these little monsters.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: It will be the first parasite we eradicate for good, very soon.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: So even if they don't generate a pickhead lines like a border did, actually, amazing things have happened when it comes to NTDs.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: All NTDs have one thing in common, they prefer to attack humans who live in the most isolated communities and who are least able to defend themselves.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: There are villages that are 500 km from the nearest health facility with no roads anywhere.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: So even if a remedy is available, what if it means going on an odyssey to get it to the patients?

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: This called for an attack using brute force.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: To stamp out NTDs once and for all, what's possibly the biggest medical program in human history was launched unmatched in scale.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Organizations from all fields are working together right now to eliminate 10 of these NTDs forever.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Ironically, every NTD is in fact preventable or treatable, but most of them can only be controlled by giving medicine to every person in all high risk areas.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: That means millions and millions of doses of medicine often force several NTDs at a time over the course of years in countries where there is no infrastructure.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Governments and health organizations just couldn't do that by themselves.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: Here, humanity got an opportunity to so off what the industrialized production of medicine can achieve.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: The farmer industry stepped in to distribute the necessary drugs for free and promised to keep doing it until those 10 diseases are gone.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: By 2020, nearly $18 billion worth of drugs will have been distributed, the largest drug donation the world has ever seen.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs
Sentence: They also helped make sure the drugs actually get to where they're needed.

Title: The Most Gruesome Parasites – Neglected Tropical Diseases – NTDs

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The fundamental currency of our universe is energy.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: It lights our homes, grows our food, ours our computers.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: We can get it lots of waste, burning fossil fuels, splitting atoms, or sunlight striking photovoltaics.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: But there's a downside to everything.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Fossil fuels are extremely toxic, nuclear waste is well, nuclear waste, and there are not enough batteries to store sunlight for cloudy days yet.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: And yet, the sun seems to have virtually limitless free energy.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Is there a way we could build a sun on Earth?

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Can we bottle a star?

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The sun shines because of nuclear fusion.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: In a nutshell, fusion is a thermonuclear process, meaning that the ingredients have to be incredibly hot, so hot that the atoms are stripped of their electrons, making a plasma when nuclei and electrons bounce around freely.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Since nuclei are all positively charged, they repel each other.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: In order to overcome this repulsion, the particles have to be going very, very fast.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: In this context, very fast means very hot.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Millions of degrees.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Stars cheat to reach these temperatures.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: They are so massive that the pressure in their cores generates the heat to squeeze the nuclei together, until they merge and fuse, creating heavier nuclei and releasing energy in the process.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: It is this energy release that scientists hope to harness in a new generation of power plant, the fusion reactor.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: On Earth, it's not feasible to use this brute force method to create fusion, so if we want to build a reactor that generates energy from fusion, we have to get clever.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: To date, scientists have invented two ways of making plasma's hot enough to fuse.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The first type of reactor uses a magnetic field to squeeze a plasma in a donut shaped chamber, where the reactions take place.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: These magnetic confinement reactors, such as the ITER reactor in France, use superconducting electro-magnets called with liquid helium to with an a few degrees of absolute zero, meaning they host some of the biggest temperature gradients in the known universe.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The second type called inertial confinement uses pulses from superpowered lasers to hit the surface of a pellet of fuel, imploding it briefly making the fuel hot and dense enough to fuse.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: In fact, one of the most powerful lasers in the world is used for fusion experiments at the National Ignition Facility in the US.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: These experiments and others light them around the world are today just experiments.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Scientists are still developing the technology.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: And although they can achieve fusion right now, it costs more energy to do the experiments than they produce in fusion.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The technology has a long way to go before it's commercially viable, and maybe it never will be.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: It might just be impossible to make a viable fusion reactor on Earth.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: But if it gets there, it will be so efficient that a single glass of sea water could be used to produce as much energy as burning a barrel of oil with no waste to speak of.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: This is because fusion reactors would use hydrogen or helium as fuel, and sea water is loaded with hydrogen.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: But not just any hydrogen will do, specific isotopes with extra neutrons called Juterium and Tritium are needed to make the right reactions.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Juterium is stable and can be found in abundance in sea water, though Tritium is a bit trickier.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: It's radioactive, and there may only be 20 kilograms of it in the world, mostly in nuclear warheads, which makes it incredibly expensive.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: So we may need another fusion body for Juterium instead of Tritium.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Helium 3, an isotope of helium, might be a great substitute.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Unfortunately, it's also incredibly rare on Earth.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: But here, the moon might have the answer.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Over billions of years, the soda wind may have built up huge deposits of helium 3 on the moon.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Instead of making helium 3, we can mine it.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: If we could sift the Lunodast for helium, we'd have enough fuel to power the entire world for thousands of years.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: One more argument for establishing a moon base if you weren't convinced already.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Okay, maybe you think building a mini sun still sounds kind of dangerous.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: But they'd actually be much safer than most other types of power plant.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: A fusion reactor is not like a nuclear plant, which can melt down catastrophically.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: If the confinement failed, then the plasma would expand and cool, and the reaction would stop.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Put simply, it's not a bomb.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The release of radioactive fuel like Tritium could pose a threat to the environment.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Tritium could bond with oxygen making radioactive water, which could be dangerous as it seems into the environment.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Fortunately, there's no more than a few grams of Tritium in use at a given time, so a leak would be quickly diluted.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: So we've just told you that there's nearly unlimited energy to be had at no expense to the environment in something as simple as water.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: So, what's the catch?

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Cost?

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: We simply don't know if fusion power will ever be commercially viable.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Even if they work, they might be too expensive to ever build.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: The main drawback is that it's unproven technology.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: It's a $10 billion gamble, and that money might be better spent on other clean energy that's already proven itself.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Maybe we should cut our losses.

Title: Fusion Power Explained – Future or Failure
Sentence: Or maybe, when the payoff is unlimited clean energy for everyone, it might be worth the risk.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: What if our universe comes with a self-destruct button to eliminate itself so cleanly and efficiently that every single physical thing would just stop existing and life would be impossible forever?

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: The ultimate ecological catastrophe, vacuum decay.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: To explain how our universe could destroy itself, we need to understand two principles.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: One, energy levels.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: A core idea in physics is that everything has an energy level.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: The higher the level, the more energy is in the system.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: For example, has a high level.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: It can be burned, a process that releases the chemical energy stored in its molecular bonds and turns it into heat.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: The ash left over is at a lower energy level than the wood before.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: Two, stability.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: Everything in our universe tries to move towards its ground state in which it's completely stable and has its little energy as possible.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: For example, a ball on the hill is unstable and has a lot of potential energy.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: When it's curved, it will roll down into the valley and lose its potential energy in the process.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: The ball is now in its ground state and stable.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: It will remain like that.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: Everything in our universe follows these two principles.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: If something has a lot of energy, it's unstable and wants to get rid of it to become stable and reach its ground state.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: This is true for every system, even in the weird world of quantum mechanics.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: If our current understanding of physics is correct, then the universe gets its properties from quantum fields.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: We explained them in detail in another video.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: For this video, imagine them as the rules of the universe.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: They tell particles how to behave and interact.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: Like everything in the universe, they want to be in the lowest energy level possible, which is called a vacuum state.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: This has nothing to do with vacuum in space.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: It's just called this way because scientists are bad at naming things.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: We think all the fields reach to their vacuum state, except maybe one.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: It's possible that the Hicks field is not stable, but matter stable, which is a fancy way of saying that it pretends to be stable, but ready is not.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: It would be a false vacuum.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: The Hicks field is responsible for giving particles their mass, which rules how almost everything in the universe interacts.

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: What would happen if the Hicks field is in a false vacuum?

Title: The Most Efficient Way to Destroy the Universe – False Vacuum
Sentence: Think of our ball in the valley.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: What if you could use genetic engineering to stop humanities most dangerous predator?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The deadliest animal on the planet responsible for the death of billions, the mighty Mosquito.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Along with other diseases, it plays host to malaria, one of the trullist parasites on Earth, possibly the single biggest killer of humans in history.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: In 2015 alone, hundreds of millions were infected and almost half a million people died.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: A new technology could help us eradicate malaria forever.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: But to do so, we need to engineer a whole animal population.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: This is not a hypothetical problem, the modified Mosquitoes already exist in a lab.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Should we use the technology and is malaria bad enough to risk it?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Malaria is caused by a group of microorganisms, Plasmodia, very weird microorganisms that consist of just a single cell.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Their parasite that completely rely on Mosquitoes, malaria always starts with an insect bite.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: In its delivery glands, thousands of sporozyds wait until the insect penetrates your skin.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Immediately after invading you, they head for the liver, where they quietly enter big cells and hide from the immune system.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: For up to a month, they stay here in stealth mode, consuming the cells alive and changing into their next form, small, droppleic, merrizzides.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: They multiply, generating thousands of cells and then burst out of the cells.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: So thousands of parasites head into the bloodstream to look for their next victims, red blood cells.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: To stay unnoticed, they wrap themselves in the membranes of the cells they killed.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Imagine that, can anyone from the inside and then taking their skin as camouflage?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Brutal.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: They now violently attack red blood cells, multiplying inside them until they burst, then finding more red blood cells and this cycle repeats over and over.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Pieces of dead cells spread lots of toxic waste material, which activates a powerful immune response causing flu-like symptoms.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Among the symptoms are high fever, sweats and chills, convulsions, headaches and sometimes vomiting and diarrhea.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: If malaria breaches the blood-brain barrier, it can cause coma, neurological damage or death.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The parasites are ready for evacuation now.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: When another mosquito bites the infected human, they get a right.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The cycle can start over.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: In 2015, the Zika virus, which causes horrible birth defects if it infects pregnant women, spread rapidly into new areas around the globe.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: It too is carried by a mosquito.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The mosquito is the perfect carrier for human diseases.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: They've been around for at least 200 million years.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: There are trillions of them, and a single one can lay up to 300 eggs at a time.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: They are practically impossible to eradicate and the perfect parasite taxi.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: But today we have new revolutionary technology that could enable us to finally win the war against them.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: CRISPR.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: For the first time in human history, we have the tools to make fast, large-scale changes to entire species.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Changing their genetic information as we place.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: So, instead of attacking isolated groups of insects, why not just change the types that transmit diseases?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Using genetic engineering, scientists successfully created a strain of mosquitoes that are immune to the malaria parasite by adding a new antibody gene that specifically targets Plasmodium.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: These mosquitoes will never spread malaria.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: But just changing genetic information is not enough.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The edits would only be inherited by half the offspring because most genes have two versions inside the genome as a failsafe.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: So, after just two generations, at most only half of the offspring would carry the engineered gene.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: In a population of billions of mosquitoes, they would hardly make a difference.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: A genetic engineering method called the gene drive solves this problem.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: It forces the new gene to become dominant in the following generations over pairing the old gene almost completely.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Thanks to this twist, 99.5% of all the engineered mosquitoes offspring will carry the antimalaria edit.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: If we were to release enough engineered mosquitoes into the wild to mate with normal mosquitoes, the malaria blocking genes would spread extremely quickly.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: As the new gene becomes a permanent feature of the mosquito population, Plasmodium would lose its home base.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Scientists hoped that the change would be so fast that they could not adapt to it quickly enough.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Malaria could virtually disappear.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: If you take into account that nearly half a million children are killed by it every year, about five have died since this video started.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Some scientists argued that we should use the technology sooner rather than later.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The mosquitoes themselves would probably only profit from this.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: They don't have anything to gain from carrying parasites.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: And this might only be the first step.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Malaria might just be the beginning.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Different mosquitoes also carry dengue fever and zika.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: This ticks transmit nine disease.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Flies transmit sleeping sickness.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Please transmit the plague.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: We could save millions of lives and prevent suffering on an unbelievable scale.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: So why haven't we done this yet?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: For one, CRISPR editing is barely four years old, so until very recently we just couldn't do it as fast and easily.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: And there are valid concerns.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Never go for, have humans consciously changed the genetic code of a free living organism on this scale.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Once we do it, there is no going back.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: So it has to be done right because there could be unwanted consequences if we set out to edit nature.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: In the specific case of Malaria though, the risk might be acceptable since the genetic modification doesn't make a big change in the overall genome, it only changes a very specific part.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The worst case scenario here is probably that it might not work or that the parasite adapts in a negative way.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: There is still much to base.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Technology is powerful as gene drive needs to be handled with a lot of care.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: But at some point, we have to ask ourselves, is it unethical to not use this technology when every day 1000 children die?

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: Humanity has to decide how to act on this in the next few years.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: The public discussion is way behind the technology in this case.

Title: Genetic Engineering and Diseases – Gene Drive & Malaria
Sentence: What do you think?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Imagine you were alive back in the 1980s and were told that computers would soon take over everything, from shopping to dating and the stock market.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The billions of people would be connected via a kind of web that you would own a handheld device, orders of magnitude more powerful than supercomputers.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It would seem absurd, but then all of it happened.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Science fiction became our reality and we don't even think about it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: There as a similar point today with genetic engineering.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: So let's talk about it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Where it came from, what we're doing right now, and about a recent breakthrough that will change how we live and what we perceive as normal forever.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Humans have been engineering life for thousands of years.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Through selective breathing, we strengthened useful traits and plants and animals.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We became very good at this, but never truly understood how it works.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Until we discovered the code of life, deoxyribonucleic acid, DNA.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: A complex molecule that guides the growth, development, function, and reproduction of everything alive.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Information is encoded in the structure of the molecule.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: More nucleotides are paired and make up a code that carries instructions.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Change the instructions and you change the being carrying it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: As soon as DNA was discovered, people tried to tickle with it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the 1960s, scientists bombarded plants with radiation to cause random mutations in the genetic code.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The idea was to get a useful plant variation by pure chance.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Sometimes it actually worked too.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the 70s, scientists inserted DNA snippets into bacteria, plants and animals to study and modify them.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: For research, medicine, agriculture, and for fun.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The earliest genetic-been-winter-modified animal was born in 1974, making mice a standard tool for research saving millions of lives.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the 80s, we got commercial.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The first patent was given for a micro-bengineered tub's or boil.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Today, we produced many chemicals by means of engineered life, like life-saving, clotting factors, growth hormones, and insulin.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: All things we had to harvest from the organs of animals before that.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The first food modified in the lab went on sale in 1994.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The flavor-savetymato, a tomato, a tomato-givl a much longer shelf life, were an extra gene that suppressed the buildup of a rotting enzyme.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But GM food and the controversy surrounding them deserve a video of their own.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the 1990s, there was also a brief foray into human engineering.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Two treat maternal infertility, babies were made that caragenetic information from three humans.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Making them the first humans ever to have three genetic parents.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Today there are supermustled pigs, fast growing salmon, fettlers chickens, and see-through frogs.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: On the front side, we made things glow in the dark.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Fluorescent zebrafish are available for as little as $10.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: All of this is already very impressive, but until recently, gene editing was extremely expensive, complicated, and took a long time to do.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: This has now changed with a revolutionary new technology now entering the stage.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: CRISPR Over night, the costs of engineering have shrunk by 99%.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Instead of a year, it takes a few weeks to conduct experiments and basically everybody with a lab can do it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It's hard to get across how big a technical revolution CRISPR is.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It literally has the potential to change humanity forever.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Why did this sudden revolution happen and how did it work?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Bacteria and viruses have been fighting since the dawn of life.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: So-called bacteria fages or fages hunt bacteria.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the ocean, fages kill 40% of them every single day.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Fages do this by inserting their own genetic code into the bacteria and taking them over to use them as factories.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The bacteria try to resist, but fail most of the time because their protection tools are too weak.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But sometimes bacteria survive an attack, only if they do so can they activate their most effective antivirus system.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: They save a part of the virus DNA in their own genetic code in a DNA archive called CRISPR.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Here, it's stored safely until it's needed.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: When the virus attacks again, the bacterium quickly makes an RNA copy from the DNA archive and arms a secret weapon, a protein called Cas9.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The protein now scans the bacterium to insides for signs of the virus invader by comparing every bit of DNA it finds to the sample from the archive.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: When it finds a 100% perfect match, it's activated and cuts out the virus DNA, making it useless, protecting the bacterium against the attack.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: What's special is that Cas9 is very precise, almost like a DNA surgeon.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The revolution began when scientists figured out that the CRISPR system is programmable.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: You can just give it a copy of DNA you want to modify and put the system into a living cell.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: If the old techniques of genetic manipulation were like a map, CRISPR is like a GPS system.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: A site from being precise, cheap and easy, CRISPR offers the ability to edit life cells, to switch genes on and off and target and study particular DNA sequences.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It also works for every type of cell, microorganisms, plants, animals or humans.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But despite the revolution CRISPR is for signs, it's still just a first-generation tool.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: More precise tools are already being created and used as we speak.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In 2015, scientists used CRISPR to cut the HIV virus out of living cells from patients in the lab, proving that it was possible.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Only about a year later, they carried out a larger scale project with rats that had the HIV virus in basically all of their body cells.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: By simply injecting CRISPR into the rat's tails, they were able to remove more than 50% of the virus from cells all over the body.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In a few decades, a CRISPR therapy might cure HIV and other retroviruses, viruses that hide inside human DNA like herpes could be eradicated this way.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: CRISPR could also defeat one of our worst enemies, cancer.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Cancer occurs when cells refuse to die and keep multiplying while concealing themselves from the immune system.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: CRISPR gives us the means to edit your immune cells and make them better cancer hunters.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Getting rid of cancer might eventually mean getting just a couple of injections of a few thousand of your own cells that have been engineered in the lab too heal you for good.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The first clinical trial for a CRISPR-Cancetreatment on human patients was approved in early 2016 in the US.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Not even a month later, Chinese scientists announced that they would treat lung cancer patients with immune cells modified with CRISPR in August 2016.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Things are picking up pace quickly.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: And then there are genetic diseases.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: There are thousands of them and they range from mildly annoying to deadly or entailed decades of suffering.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: With a powerful tool like CRISPR, we may be able to end this.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Over 3000 genetic diseases are caused by a single incorrect letter in your DNA.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We are already building a modified version of Cas9 that is made to change just a single letter fixing the disease in the cell.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In a decade or two, we could possibly cure thousands of diseases forever.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: With all of these medical applications have one thing in common, they are limited to the individual and die with them, except if you use them on reproductive cells or very early embryos.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But CRISPR can and probably will be used for much more.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The creation of modified humans, design a babies, and will mean gradual but irreversible changes to the human gene pool.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The means to edit the genome of a human embryo already exist, though the technology is still in its early stages, but it has already been attempted twice.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In 2015 and 2016, Chinese scientists experimented with human embryos and were partially successful on their second attempt.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: They showed the enormous challenges we still face in gene editing embryos, but also that scientists are working on solving them.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: This is like the computer in the 70s, there will be better computers.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Regardless of your personal take on genetic engineering, it will affect you.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Modified humans could alter the genome of our entire species because their engineered traits will be passed on to their children and could spread over generations slowly modifying the whole gene pool of humanity.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It will start slowly.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The first designer babies will not be overly designed, it's most likely that they will be created to eliminate deadly genetic disease running in a family.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: As the technology progresses and gets more refined, more and more people may argue that not using genetic modification is unethical because it condemns children to preventable suffering and death and denies them the cure.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But as soon as the first engineered kid is born, a door is opened that can't be closed anymore.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Early on, vanity traits will mostly be left alone.

Sentence: Our test genetic modification becomes more accepted and our knowledge of our genetic code enhances the temptation will grow.

Sentence: Huge changes are made as a result of the personal decisions of millions of individuals that accumulate.

Sentence: This is a slippery slope.

Sentence: Modified humans could become the new standard.

Sentence: But as engineering becomes more normal and our knowledge improves, we could solve the single biggest mortality risk factor, aging.

Sentence: Two thirds of the 150,000 people who died today will die of age-related causes.

Sentence: Currently, we think aging is caused by the accumulation of damage to ourselves like DNA breaks and the system's responsible for fixing those wearing our overtime.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But there are also genes that directly affect aging, a combination of genetic engineering and other therapy could stop or slow down aging, maybe even reverse it.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Maybe we could even borrow a few genes for ourselves.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Some scientists even think biological aging could be something that eventually just stopped spying a thing.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We would still die at some point, but instead of doing so in hospitals at age 90, we might be able to spend a few thousand years with our loved ones.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Research into this is in its infancy.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: And many scientists are rightly skeptical about the end of aging.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The challenges are enormous and maybe it is unachievable.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But it is conceivable that people alive today might be the first to profit from effective anti-aging therapy.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: All we might need is for someone to convince a smart billionaire to make it their next problem to solve.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: On a bigger scale, we certainly could solve many problems by having a modified population.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Engineering humans might be better equipped to cope with high energy food, eliminating many diseases of civilization like obesity.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In possession of a modified immune system, with a library of potential threats, we might become immune to most diseases that haunt us today.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Even further into the future, we could engineer humans to be equipped for extended space travel and to cope with different conditions on other planets.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Which would be extremely helpful in keeping us alive in our hostile universe.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Still a few major challenges await us, some technological, some ethical.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Many of you watching will feel uncomfortable and fear that we will create a world in which we will reject non-perfect humans and pre-select features and qualities based on our idea of what's healthy.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The thing is, we are already living in this world.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Invests for dozens of genetic diseases or complications have become standard for pregnant women in much of the world.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Often the mere suspicion of a genetic defect can lead to the end of a pregnancy.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Take Down Syndrome, for example, one of the most common genetic defects.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In Europe, about 92% of all pregnancies were its detected are terminated.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The decision to terminate pregnancy is incredibly personal, but it's important to acknowledge the reality that we are pre-selecting humans based on medical conditions.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: There is also no use in pretending this will change, so we have to act carefully and respectfully as we advance the technology and can make more and more selections.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But none of this will happen soon.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: As powerful as CRISPR is and it is, it's not in-fallible yet.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Wrong edits still happen, as well as unknown errors that occur anywhere in the DNA and might go unnoticed.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The gene edit might achieve the desired result, disabling a disease, but also might accidentally trigger unwanted changes.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We just don't know enough yet about the complex interplay of our genes to avoid unpredictable consequences.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Working on accuracy and monitoring methods is a major concern as the first human trials begin.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: And since we've discussed a possible positive future, there are darker visions too.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Imagine what a state-like North Korea could do if they embraced genetic engineering.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Could a state cement its rule forever by forcing gene editing on their subjects?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: What would stop a totalitarian regime from engineering and army of modified super soldiers?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: It is doable in theory.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Sonarios like this one are far, far off into the future, if they ever become possible at all.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: But the basic proof of concept for genetic engineering like this already exists today.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The technology really is that powerful.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: While this might be a tempting reason to ban genetic editing and related research, that would certainly be a mistake.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Baning human genetic engineering would only lead to the science wandering off to a pace with jurisdiction and rules that we're uncomfortable with.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Only by participating can we make sure that further research is guided by caution, reason, oversight and transparency.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Do you feel uncomfortable now?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Most of us have something wrong with them.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: In the future that lies ahead of us, would we have been allowed to exist?

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: The technology is certainly a bit scary, but we have a lot to gain and genetic engineering might just be a step in the natural evolution of intelligent species in the universe.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We might end disease.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: We could extend our life expectancy by centuries and travel to the stars.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: There's no need to think small when it comes to this topic.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: Whatever your opinion on genetic engineering, the future is approaching no matter what.

Title: Genetic Engineering Will Change Everything Forever – CRISPR
Sentence: What has been in science fiction is about to become our new reality, a reality full of opportunities and challenges.
